alert.note: Alert for Adams; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 9:36PM CST until December 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN PIKE AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS...RALLS COUNTY IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI...EASTERN AUDRAIN COUNTY IN CENTRAL MISSOURI...NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI...SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTY IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI...NORTHEASTERN CALLAWAY COUNTY IN CENTRAL MISSOURI AND NORTHWESTERN PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 936 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fall Creek to near Fulton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hannibal, Fulton, Vandalia, Wellsville, Payson, New London, Fall Creek, Laddonia, Center, Frankford, Farber, Martinsburg, Curryville, Shamrock, Williamsburg, Spencerburg, Adams, Burton, Liberty and Hull. This includes the following highways... Interstate 172 between exits 2 and 10. Interstate 72 between exits 4 and 10. Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 155 and 161. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
